thread.title: 20 Wholesome, Hearty Ground Beef Recipes — Recipes from The Kitchn
thread.title_full: 20 Wholesome, Hearty Ground Beef Recipes — Recipes from The Kitchn

author: Sheela Prakash
title: 20 Wholesome, Hearty Ground Beef Recipes — Recipes from The Kitchn
text:
Share 
Getting a satisfying meal on the table is quite simple when there is ground beef in the equation. Whether it's being patted into burgers , spooned over pasta , or even sprinkled over salad , the possibilities are nearly endless when you have a pound of ground beef on hand. Here are 20 extra-hearty dinners to make with this humble yet hardworking ingredient. Jeffrey Alford & Naomi Duguid's Lettuce Salad with Hot Beef Dressing (Image credit: Kimberley Hasselbrink ) Vegetables, Stuffed and Sprinkled 
Give your veggies a protein boost and turn them into the main attraction by adding some ground beef to the equation. From a classic stuffed pepper to a wholesome and hearty salad topped with a hot beef dressing, here's how to do meat with a heaping side of veggies.
